Iot for Smart Cities

Published: Feb 10, 2019 Tags: iot, booknotes, smartcity Category: ComputerScience

Smart cities: Everyone's connected If everyone, every home, and every business is connected via the IoT, why not take the next step and connect your entire neighborhood, or even the whole city? Connected devices can help reduce congestion on local roadways, alert the fire department in case of emergencies, and even signal the need for road maintenance or additional police patrols.
